rooms.name: Deluxe Valley View Room
rooms.shortDescription: Experience ultimate comfort with panoramic valley views and warm wooden interiors.
rooms.longDescription: Our Deluxe Valley View Room offers cozy comfort with elegant interiors, modern amenities, and a private balcony overlooking the lush green Himalayan valley. Perfect for couples or solo travelers looking for a serene retreat.

rooms.name: Luxury Suite with Mountain View
rooms.shortDescription: Spacious suite offering a majestic Himalayan view with luxurious amenities.
rooms.longDescription: Designed for those who seek exclusivity, the Luxury Suite offers unmatched comfort with panoramic views of snow-capped peaks. Featuring elegant furnishings, ambient lighting, and a large private balcony.

rooms.name: Family Cottage
rooms.shortDescription: A perfect mountain escape for families with spacious interiors and a private garden view.
rooms.longDescription: The Family Cottage combines rustic charm and comfort. With multiple rooms, modern facilities, and access to a private garden, it's ideal for families or groups seeking peace amidst the Himalayas.

rooms.name: Wooden Cabin
rooms.shortDescription: A cozy wooden cabin nestled amidst pine trees — perfect for couples and solo travelers.
rooms.longDescription: Built entirely of natural pinewood, this cabin provides an authentic mountain living experience. Wake up to birdsong and misty mornings surrounded by nature’s calm.

gallary.title: Mountain View Room
gallary.description: A cozy mountain view room with all modern amenities and breathtaking scenery.
gallary.additionalInfo: Perfect for couples and solo travelers.

gallary.title: Luxury Suite
gallary.description: Spacious luxury suite with elegant interiors and a private balcony.
gallary.additionalInfo: Includes complimentary breakfast and spa access.

gallary.title: Cottage Exterior
gallary.description: Rustic cottages surrounded by nature, ideal for a peaceful retreat.

gallary.title: Hilltop Restaurant
gallary.description: Restaurant with panoramic hilltop views and gourmet cuisine.

gallary.title: Resort Garden
gallary.description: Beautiful landscaped gardens with walking paths and fountains.
gallary.additionalInfo: Ideal for morning walks and photography.

experiences.title: Himalayan Trek Adventure
experiences.description: A thrilling 5-day trek through the Himalayan ranges, covering scenic valleys, snow-covered trails, and breathtaking campsites.

experiences.title: Cultural Walk in Jaipur
experiences.description: Explored the cultural heritage of Jaipur through its colorful bazaars, palaces, and local cuisine on a guided cultural walk.

experiences.title: Beach Cleanup Initiative
experiences.description: Participated in a community-led beach cleanup drive promoting sustainable tourism and marine life protection.

experiences.title: Mountain Photography Workshop
experiences.description: Joined a 3-day mountain photography workshop, capturing landscapes, monasteries, and local lifestyles.
